name: Filename validator
description:
Validates a filename for cross-platform filesystem compatibility. Doesn't allow leading dot or omitting the file extension.

The regex may accept bad UTF-8 strings.
content:
Bad filenames:
.hidden
executable
dollar$.doc
colons:in:filename.doc
good?.pdf
no!.pdf
<file1.pdf
file2>.pdf
asterisk*.exe
"asdf.com
'qwer.net
pa/th.txt
pa\th.txt
pi|pe.txt
br{ack.et
br}ack.et
br(ack.et
br)ack.et
br[ack.et
br]ack.et

Good filenames:
Name with spaces.exe
some_file1.docx
asm.00
Wöndärful.pdf

Odd but acceptable filenames:
 .space
 @.exe
 text.TxT
 ‰_~.OmO
